name: tm02
effect: Teaches Dragon Claw to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Dragon Claw to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Headbutt Gen I: Razor Wind)

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Hooks and slashes
the foe with long,
sharp claws.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Hooks and slashes
the foe with long,
sharp claws.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
Sharp, huge claws
hook and slash the
foe quickly and
with great power.

flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The target is taunted into a rage that allows it to use
only attack moves for three turns.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
Numerous coins are hurled at the target to inflict
damage. Money is earned after the battle.
